parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for South Australia 2004 (term began 1.7.2005) and 2010.

parliamentary.positions.title: Parliamentary Positions
parliamentary.positions.para: Temporary Chair of Committees from 12.2.08 to 4.9.08.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Standing: Library from 1.7.05 to 7.12.05; Scrutiny of Bills from 23.6.05 to 30.6.08; Senators' Interests from 1.7.05 to 11.2.08; Selection of Bills from 1.7.08 (Chair from 27.9.10 to 11.11.13); House from 26.10.10; Procedure from 12.11.13; Privileges from 12.2.15.

Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Rural and Regional Affairs and Transport: Legislation and References Committees from 1.7.05 to 11.9.06; Rural and Regional Affairs and Transport from 11.9.06 to 11.2.08; Employment, Workplace Relations and Education from 11.9.06 to 11.2.08; Environment, Communications and the Arts from 12.2.08 (Chair from 12.2.08) to 14.5.09; Environment, Communications and the Arts: Legislation and References Committees from 14.5.09 to 27.9.10; Environment and Communications: Legislation Committee from 30.9.10 to 1.7.11; Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade from 12.2.08 to 14.5.09; Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade: Legislation Committee from 1.7.11 to 11.11.13 and from 6.3.14 and References Committee from 12.11.13; Economics from 17.3.08 to 30.6.08; Finance and Public Administration: References Committee from 1.7.11 to 11.11.13.
Senate Select: Fuel and Energy from 1.7.08 to 30.8.10; Electricity Prices from 23.8.12 to 1.11.12; National Broadband Network from 26.03.15.
Joint Standing: Migration from 14.2.08 to 1.7.11; Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade from 1.7.11.

conf.delegations.visits.title: Conferences, Delegations and Visits
conf.delegations.visits.para: Member, Parliamentary Delegation to Indonesia and Papua New Guinea, January 2006.
Member, Parliamentary Delegation to Canada, Germany, Singapore and USA, April 2007.
Member, Parliamentary Delegation to the European Institutions, April 2008.
Member, Parliamentary Delegation to Mongolia, January 2011.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Deputy Government Whip in the Senate from 1.7.08 to 27.9.10.
Chief Government Whip in the Senate from 27.9.10 to 18.9.13.
Chief Opposition Whip in the Senate from 18.10.13.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Secretary, Australian Services Union (SA and NT) 2002-05.
